item.title: Irina add a quote by Markus Zusak
Irina add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "Don't be afraid of enemies who attack you. Be afraid of the friends who flatter you." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Irina add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "It isn't what you have or who you are or where you are or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think about it." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Irina add a quote by William Shakespear
item.description: "There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so." -- William Shakespear

item.title: Irina add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Irina add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Irina add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "...one opportunity leads directly to another, just as risk leads to more risk, life to more life, and death to more death." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Irina add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Irina add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I want to stand as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can't see from the center." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Irina add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Irina add a quote by Mary Higgins Clark
item.description: "Funny, when you finally faced reality, it was amazing how clearly you could see things." -- Mary Higgins Clark
